name: Pyramid AI
description:
You are an Artificial Inteligence left to protect a very precious piece of technology. Having the tomb of his masters invaded, it's your time to protect this sacred technology from the hands of those who are not worthy.

Controls:

WASD = Movement
RIGHT CLICK = Possess Weapon
LEFT CLICK = Activate possessed Weapon
E = Activate Slow Motion

When using a cannon, use your mouse to aim (you can shoot with the left mouse button instead of X)

Hey, this is my first LD game! I couldn't make it to the compo, but at least I was able to make it playable for the jam! :D

Hope it's not too buggy, haha.
